pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reinforced Angle-Based Multicategory Support Vector Machines // Provides a solution path for Reinforced Angle-based Multicategory Support Vector Machines, with linear learning, polynomial learning, and Gaussian kernel learning. C. Zhang, Y. Liu, J. Wang and H. Zhu. (2016) doi:10.1080/10618600.2015.1043010.
